properties.description: I retrieve the pillow from my doorstep and put it on my bed, yay! I finally got my pillow!
properties.title: My house (consumer)

properties.description: feathers come from all over, then bought and taken to the factory using trucks.  They are bought by the  Hollanders
properties.title: Feathers

properties.description: The company Hollanders biggest factory. Hollander is a online store, so they ship the products right to you. Pillows are constructed with a baster that stuffs the pillows with a hose then it is sown up by people with sowing machines.
properties.address: Spade Ranch Rd, Throckmorton, TX 76483, USA
properties.title: Hollander Factory
China Cotton
properties.description: China also grows a lot of cotton which is ships or used to make other things (like fabric). They use huge harvesters to quickly gather the cotton form the fields.

properties.title: Fabric Fatory
properties.description: Most of the fabric use for pillows are bought cheaply from China. To save money but not distance.

A supply chain is how a product gets to you from the most simple of materials to a complex pill you take at night. I've overheard alot of things about finding the supply chain, that its always more complex then you think. But I looked at a pillow and found that not all things are ridiculously complex, but there are some things that are simplicity at its finest.
properties.title: Simplicity at its Finest (Pillows)
